chara.textHome: You want to know about me?

I'm Corbeau.
Younger sister of Lapin, older sister of Minou.

I've dedicated myself to destroying
France's so-called saint and her friends.
She's ruining our benefactor's plans, see?

I'd like to take her out before my sisters
get involved, too.

This English army captain said there's a foe
out there that they refuse to lose to.

It's nice that relationships like that exist,
even among weak humans.
I'll tell you about my trump card.

I wield magic that spreads
the Black Death...

Enemies and allies alike
perish from its despair.

Heh, stronger magic means
better bloodbaths!

Perfect, I feel my power
bubbling up within.

Now I want to work it out with
some nice blood sports.
*Chuckle*

I can't wait to use this power
in my next fight!
Lapin and Minou can stay back.
I'll fight for all three of us.
Heh, I'm glad...
Now I can protect the ones I love.

Too bad for my enemies...
They'll be crushed in seconds!
I see you lived to fight another day.
*Chuckle* I like people with fight in 'em.
Who would I try and kill if you died on me?!
Good morning to you. Are you well?
Pffft, what's with that look?

I grew up in a palace, you know.
I know how to greet someone.

You hungry? Should I have someone
make you something?

Our benefactor gave us some maids,
and some are pretty good at cooking.
Enchantée...
Charmed to meet you.
I've long awaited our meeting.
I am Corbeau, a Magical Girl.
To put it simply...
I'm your worst nightmare!

About time I went back to the fort,
I have plans with Lapin and Minou.
We promised to soak together!
What a day...

I met with Minou, and passed the boss's
orders to the English troops.
I'm so ready for battle.
Oh, how I miss the smell of blood.

The shadow mage in black who's
always with the holy girl is great!

My heart's racing thinking about how we'll
torture each other next time we fight!
Time to get going.

I love playing cat and mouse,
both sides of it...

I hope I get to fight to the death
with someone strong!

A place where you can fight
copies of Magical Girls?

Who cares if they're real or not,
if you can go wild?
I'm in!
What do you want?
Sorry, I'm busy.
I'll have a maid spar with you.

They're pretty strong, unlike
your average Magical Girl.
Not bad at all, holy girl of France!

I thought I'd obliterated you,
but here you are, back for more.
Let's play a little rougher this time!
What even is that little white beast?
Qube?
No clue what that is!
And Miss Saint calls it "Monsieur Angel"?
What a joke!
Minou is a sweet little sister.

She can't fight well, but she'll rush in with
magic if things look bad for me.
I must drive her nuts.

Lapin and Minou love destroying weaklings
—that's fine, but my favorite is fighting
tooth and nail against a strong enemy.
I can't lose against a Magical Girl.

See, I've got this special skill... Thanks to
that, my Soul Gem has never been tainted!
Not even once!
Let me tell you our secret:

Some of our maids have
Magical Girl potential.

They make a wish, then we
benefit from the power!

I seek power so I can keep my dear
sisters, Lapin and Minou, safe.

But I think it may be too late to save
our benefactor...our mother.

When I pick a maid with Magical Girl
potential and drag her to our benefactor's
room, the others look jealous...

I think they're misunderstanding
the situation.
Let's get this party started!
Any complaints?
Done already?
You're barely worth playing with.

Now you, you're fun.
I had a GREAT time!
Well, that was a letdown.

Heh, now I'll be able to protect
my sisters to the end.
Mmm, nice.
Now I'm ready to enjoy a good bloodbath...
You have my attention!
How about we play sometime?
What weapon do I specialize in?
The way I fight isn't very typical...

I let these feathers loose and
lock my foes in place!
